embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

replies.body: Mastery scores are calculated based on how well you did compared to others playing the same champion in the role you played. It could have been a low vision score, or other Varus players simply had a better overall score.
probably haha i did really have a low vision score, ill try again next time :))
I gotta be honest here, I would not even HOPE for an S with 10/5 on Varus, I would fathom that with Varus you would need AT LEAST 3 or 4 times as many kills as deaths to approach S.
oh i see but do assists help in getting an s?
